record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 1, S. 2, S. 5, S. 113

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, it is my understanding there are four bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading, en bloc.

record.chair: The clerk will read the four bills, en bloc, for the first time.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask for a second reading in order to place the bills on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, and having done that, I object to my own requests en bloc.
